description:
I like that it offer plenty off options from where to download the images. 
I think a great improvement would make it run in the backgrpund or in the tray icon, because the window keep getting in the way when switching apps and if I close it the changer stops.
summary: Plenty of option to download from, but need some improvements

description: I am running RebornOS, Arch Linux and I have AMD video drivers. I think that somehow my display driver conflicted with this program. Once I restarted the system, I got the message "Failed to start Light Display Manager". I was able to reset the display manager, but now some icons and settings are not right.
summary: After install my desktop settings got munged

description: Nice app and it works well. Gets the wallpaper from various sites in 4k resolution and refreshes the desktop periodically (configurable).
Works as expected, easy to use - recommend!
summary: Works as expected, easy to use - recommend!

description: It has a lot of options and you can even download wallpapers related to several search terms defined. It can change your wallpaper automatically too. Very complete!
summary: Great application to customize desktop wallpapers

description: crash on start, does not launch Fedora 38
summary: crash on start, does not launch
